Title: A Matter of Geography
Writer: Tom Perrotta (based on the book by), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Damon Lindelof, Tom Perrotta
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Margaret Qualley
Plot: Kevin, Nora and Jill try to pick up the pieces in the aftermath of the Mapleton riots. Nora makes an impulsive choice. Kevin becomes entangled in the Murphy family's problems.
